Package org.pepstock.charba.client.annotation

Interface IsDefaultsRotationHandler

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    HasRotation, IsDefaultsAbstractCircleBasedAnnotation, IsDefaultsBoxAnnotation, IsDefaultsBoxLabel, IsDefaultsEllipseAnnotation, IsDefaultsEllipseLabel, IsDefaultsLabelAnnotation, IsDefaultsPointAnnotation, IsDefaultsPolygonAnnotation
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBoxedLabel, AbstractCircleBasedAnnotation, BoxAnnotation, BoxLabel, DefaultBox, DefaultBoxLabel, DefaultEllipse, DefaultEllipseLabel, DefaultLabel, DefaultPoint, DefaultPolygon, EllipseAnnotation, EllipseLabel, LabelAnnotation, PointAnnotation, PolygonAnnotation
    interface IsDefaultsRotationHandler
    This is the default options for items which provides rotation property.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default double getRotation()
      Returns the rotation in degrees.
      default RotationCallback<AnnotationContext> getRotationCallback()
      Returns the callback called to set the rotation in degrees.
